metadata.title: CVE-2020-13844 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Arm Armv8-A core implementations utilizing speculative execution pastunconditional changes in control flow may allow unauthorized disclosure ofinformation to an attacker with local user access via a side-channelanalysis, aka "straight-line speculation."

criterions.comment: gcc-snapshot package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
gcc-arm-none-eabi package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
gcc-avr package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
gcc-h8300-hms package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
gcc-mingw-w64 package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
gcc-opt package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
